summary: A recluse telemarkets at an office, where his boss is his only friend. As he befriends a new, social colleague and sketches/paints her, his dark mind surfaces.
cast: Annie Neal|Joel David Moore|Zachary Levi|Lori Yohe|Amber Tamblyn|Ryan Chase|Nick Sowell|David Muller|Rose Weiker|Patrick Semmes|Jenson Segui|Mary Benson|Tricia Helfer|Rileah Vanderbilt|Sean Bailey|Aundre Barnes|Deb Blume|Arlene Ancheta|Todd Chatalas|Spencer Conway|Amber Dahl|Andrew Danhorn|Courtney Davis|Judd Eustice|John Hugill|Matt Kimmel|Teresa Koberstein|Kristen Luman|Cathi-Jo McCoy|Bryna Smith|Traci Vitale|Todd A. Robinson|Jeremy Danial Boreing|Kai Evans|Reuben Rox|Heather Wakehouse
director: Directors: Adam Green, Joel David Moore
title: Spiral
